nodes.excerpt: Mars26 is an open source Mars map in high-resolution, natural color. Built on top of previous CTX & Viking satellite photography, merged into an interactive map with full coverage. Zoom in, explore and place tweets at your favorite Mars locations.
nodes.title: Mars26 - Open source, high resolution, natural color Mars map
nodes.author: Spacep

nodes.excerpt: Put your energy back into having delightful and collaborative sessions all from one place with Butter. â € Comes with built-in agenda, polls, breakouts, Miro, fun reactions, sounds, and many more!
nodes.title: Butter - All-in-one tool for the smoothest virtual workshops ğŸ§ˆ

nodes.excerpt: NextUX makes it easy to capture full-page screenshots and add contextual comments on your website or web app. Cut up, rearrange, and add to existing designs or create designs from scratch. Share ideas and rapidly iterate in real-time on an infinite canvas.
nodes.title: NextUX Visual Editor - Easy-to-use iteration app for non-designers
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: The very first escape game for coders and non-coders. An all-new coding experience. Play with your family, friends, or colleagues. Have fun as a team, 100% online, remotely or on-site. A fun mix of riddles and coding puzzles, in 12+ programming languages.
nodes.title: CodingEscape - The escape game for coders and non-coders
nodes.author: Nicolas GreniÃ©

nodes.excerpt: Breakout Groups lets hosts on all price plans start breakout sessions where participants can split into smaller groups. Perfect for working with your team or classmates, or hanging out with friends on Whereby.
nodes.title: Breakout Groups by Whereby - The easiest way to team up, break out, and collaborate
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Talk is a free & open-source video conference app for the web. Works in all major browsers. No signups. No downloads. 100% peer-to-peer.
nodes.title: Talk - A free & open-source group video call thats works in browser

nodes.excerpt: Get movie recommendations using AI. Choose the movies you love and the AI will immediately find recommendations based on over 100 million ratings in our database.
nodes.title: Cinemate - Movie recommendations using AI.
nodes.author: Emil

nodes.excerpt: An innovative and re-imagined version of HN for this decade. With an improved UI/UX, story mode like Snapchat, and a focus to design it in a "202X" way for instant HN content consumption. Also, a new https://twitter.com/boxpiperapp in town will keep you HN updated, once a day.
nodes.title: Box Piper Hacker News - Re-Imagined Hacker News for this decade.
nodes.author: Sanket Makhija

nodes.excerpt: Stumble through the internet and discover random websites. Stumbled is a curated collection of anything interesting, weird or astonishing; websites of exceptional quality, sites to kill time or learn something new.
nodes.title: Stumbled - Discover the most interesting, weird and awesome websites.
nodes.author: Kevin Woblick

nodes.excerpt: Virtual rooms are like real ones where you can walk, talk and move objects. We offer many collaboration tools for teambuilding, brainstorming, lessons and other activities. GetLocus isn't a video chat, but a meeting space. Get your location in a digital world!
nodes.title: getLocus - An interactive workspace featuring a whiteboard & video chat

nodes.excerpt: Chaos is a bookmarking app that lets you save any link, image or document. Use powerful features like infinite nesting and previews to seamlessly interact with your things. Your data is safely stored in the cloud, and accessible on desktop and the web.
nodes.title: Chaos - Organize your mess of links, images and documents
nodes.author: Sarim Abbas

nodes.excerpt: Collect customer feedback and leads on your website, blog, or email, using the power and simplicity of emojis.
nodes.title: Emojise - Easily capture customer feedback (& leads) using emojis ğŸ¤©

nodes.title: Snakkerâ„¢ - An interactive and engaging video content creation tool

nodes.excerpt: Wonderment brings transparency back to shipping. Our order tracking platform gives eCommerce merchants a 360 degree view into their shipments, spots any shipping delays or issues automatically, and then enables brands to proactively communicate with customers about their order. ğŸ‘‰ Try it free: wonderment.com
nodes.title: Wonderment - Ecommerce order tracking for Shopify stores

nodes.excerpt: HTTPDump gives you unique endpoints to dump data and inspect in real time. It also enables you to compare or mock response.
nodes.title: HTTPDump - Inspect HTTP requests, compare them or mock response

nodes.excerpt: Over 2000 failed company submissions covering founder stories and company failure analysis. To continue helping the startup ecosystem, submit your autopsy today: https://startup-research.typeform.com/to/fOrakq
nodes.title: Autopsy - A collection of post-mortems & lessons from failed startups
nodes.author: Shifullah Mansur

nodes.excerpt: There are too many no-code tools out there, and all of them have wonderful templates. But, if you want to find the right template to launch quickly, you have to scan the entire internet! - Beyta helps - and we'll be actively updating our template list. :)
nodes.title: Beyta - Search templates across no-code tools to launch quicker.

nodes.excerpt: FormTestr automates lead form testing to eliminate submission errors, boost leads, and increase revenue.
nodes.title: FormTestr - Never lose money to broken forms again
nodes.author: Ben Wright

nodes.excerpt: FigJam is an online whiteboard for teams to collaborate, brainstorm, map out flows, and more. FigJam is easy to learn and fun to use, so anyone can participate and share their ideas.
nodes.title: FigJam - An online whiteboard from Figma designed for teams
nodes.author: Kenrick Rilee

nodes.excerpt: Material Tailwind is an easy to use components library for Tailwind CSS and Material Design. It features multiple React components, all written with Tailwind CSS classes and Material Design guidelines. Coming soon components for VueJS, Angular and many more.
nodes.title: Material Tailwind - Components library for Tailwind CSS & Material Design
nodes.author: Sajad Ahmad Nawabi

nodes.excerpt: Download thousands of free videos, images, and music tracks. We've handpicked some of the best work created by our global artist community so you can bring your vision to life. Create world-class content for your website, social media, and marketing campaigns.
nodes.title: Pond5 Free Collection - Thousands of high-quality videos, images, and music tracks
nodes.author: himi das

nodes.excerpt: Storyteller is a no-code interactive tutorial builder. It can be used for product demonstrations or interactive product instructions to help promote products, as well as for teaching and remote instruction. Submit your email address to get early access!
nodes.title: Storyteller - No-code interactive tutorial builder
nodes.author: Mengdi Mu

nodes.excerpt: Jupiter makes meal planning and grocery shopping easy with personalized recipe and product recommendations all delivered to your door. Our autopilot technology learns from your preferences so you eat better, waste less and save time on planning & shopping.
nodes.title: Jupiter - Instagram meets Whole Foods
